sub_title: I connect with people who care about the sustainability of our 🌍planet & dare to re-shape the future. Driven to improve quality of life.  Nature lover 🏕️ & passionate about ⛷️winter sports 🗻& 🌊kitesurfing 🏄🏼‍♀️.
summary:
I bring extended experience (>15 yrs) working for both national and international organisations. (From medium to large size businesses, IT Tech starts-up and Scape-ups to large Multinationals).

Key areas of expertise: 
1.People | 2. Leadership | 3. Organisational Development | 4. Program management

1. Operational (day-to-day) HR or TA management, Talent Management, Career Framework and Job-profiling, Competency Mapping, Performance, Growth & Rewarding (Appraisal), Learning & Development, HR Policies, HR Tooling & System Integrations.Talent Acquisition, (Online) Corporate & Employer Marketing strategies such as Employer Branding, Targeted Campaigns, Employer Value Proposition Development and Inclusion.

2. Change Management, Leadership Skills Development, Reporting, Data Analytics, High Performance Teaming.

3. Determine Business Goals, Growth and Strategy planning, Defining Values, Organisational Structure, Self-Assessment, Stakeholder and SWOT Analysis, Vision and Mission. 

4. Logical Framework, Project Design & Development, Strategy Plan, Monitoring and Evaluation.

Exploring is my nature and I ♡ technology. I always try to find better ways and innovative solutions.  My analytical mindset helps me get things done. I am ambitious but most of all I am passionate about my work and I will inspire others, care about my team and the organisation. Therefore, I will always show respect & be able to value the work of others, making tomorrow possible.

*Getting Things Done  * Strong Negotiation Skills * Process optimisation * (New) Business Development * Stakeholder Management  * People Management * Trustworthy * Business Partnering * Reorganisation * Strategy Development * Tech Tool Implementations. 

Educational background:

1. Nyenrode Business University, HR & Verandermanagement | van organisatieverandering naar effectieve organisatieontwikkeling
2. Vijfhart ICT opleidingen, Agile & Scrum
3. Schouten & Nelissen, Master module Leren en innoveren
4. De Baak Trainingen, Management van Mensen
5. Universiteit van Amsterdam, Master of Science (MSc), MSc Business Administration

awards.title: Als panellid onderdeel van het Recruiterspanel "CV van de Maand" vanuit Sollicitatielab

authors.headline: I connect with people who care about the sustainability of our 🌍planet & dare to re-shape the future. Driven to improve quality of life.  Nature lover 🏕️ & passionate about ⛷️winter sports 🗻& 🌊kitesurfing 🏄🏼‍♀️.

profile_positions.description:
TRANSFORM YOUR WORLD

Our work goes far deeper than providing technical solutions and expert advice on some of the world’s greatest projects. We exist to improve quality of life for our communities, our clients and our people. We are here to find long lasting solutions to the world's biggest challenges while making a difference to everyone's lives, now and in the future.

At Arcadis we focus on attracting, retaining and developing people who share our passion and commitment to improve quality of life. In return we offer you the opportunity to transform your world and the world around you, that could be through client work, upskilling yourself, championing equality and inclusion or getting involved in charity work, to name just a few. Our people value different perspectives, they care about the sustainability of our planet and dare to shape the future. 


--------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------

Arcadis is een toonaangevende internationale organisatie die ontwerp-, engineering- en adviesdiensten levert voor een duurzame gebouwde en natuurlijke omgeving. Met meer dan 36.000 mensen in ruim 70 landen zetten we ons in om de leefomgeving over de hele wereld te verbeteren.

Ons doel bij Arcadis is het verbeteren van de kwaliteit van leven. Dit doen we al meer dan 130 jaar in steden en lokale gemeenschappen over de hele wereld. En de drijvende kracht hierachter is de belangrijkste asset van ons bedrijf, onze mensen.

Waar je ook werkt, wat je ook doet – als Arcadiaan zit improving quality of life in jouw DNA.
Om dit te bereiken, omarmen we een cultuur waarin jij op de eerste plek staat. Waar jij werkt aan spraakmakende projecten, in Nederland of daarbuiten. En waar ruimte is om persoonlijk en professioneel te groeien, door een flexibele carrière te bouwen die voor jou werkt.

Peter Oosterveer, Chief Executive Officer; "Het verbeteren van de levenskwaliteit is meer dan wat we doen, het is wat we zijn."
profile_positions.title: Talent Acquisition

profile_positions.description:
Let's create <more> value...Together! *DoubleYOU is interim project management and consultancy.

The strongest power of value is <people> value without any words. Added value is within in yourself. Therefore; You can <CREATE> value and you can <ADD> value. “(MORE) value” is something which can be created by yourself, your team or even when the organisation or manager adds, adjusts or changes something.

DoubleYOU(*W) Let's dive into YOU<r> , the people & organisation, looking for the real gold and create ADDED VALUE, Together.

-----------------------------------------
Laten we samen méér waarde creëren! 

Bureau*DoubleYOU is interim management, project begeleiding en advies in (meer,-)waardecreatie. 

De echte kracht van waarde is namelijk waarde zonder woorden. Waarde zit in jezelf. Waarde kan je maken en waarde kan je toevoegen. “(meer) toegevoegde waarde” ontstaat pas als er iets ontstaat of iemand iets toevoegt, aanpast of verandert. 

Kortom, is het tijd om een volgende stap te zetten, waardoor er (meer)waarde ontstaat? 

Laat Bureau*DoubleYOU(*W=waarde) op zoek gaan naar het echte goud waardoor die stap sneller, makkelijker of beter te zetten is.
profile_positions.title: Company Owner | WaardeMaker

profile_positions.description:
“Winter sports, ski and/or snowboard travel isn’t just about snow and mountains. It about exploring & seeing new places, meeting new people and exploring new cultures. It’s about that and so much more”.  

It’s all about experiencing something which is totally different from your day-to-day life. It’s about letting go of your daily routines, and stepping into a new snow adventure, be it a fast paced, exciting escapade or a more languid, laid-back voyage to a new place. Whichever the case, winter sports travel keeps you young through wonder. It awakens your inner child, always questioning, always curious, enthusiastic and yearning for more.

ℹGo and Explore: www.snowplanners.com 

We are Snowplanners and our heart just beats faster in the winter. We are a community of international Snowsports professionals with the same white DNA where entrepreneurship, friendship, adventure, mountains, snow, sports, and fun are our core principles.

We create, shape & execute custom-made ski and winter adventure trips for families, friends, and corporates.

We share our adventures, publish articles and inform you about the latest snow & weather forecasts in the mountains.

Connect with us for your next, ultimate snow experience. Our in-depth snow knowledge and experience allow us to deliver and perform at the highest level. Why? We admire and respect the mountains.
profile_positions.title: Chief Operations Officer

profile_positions.description:
In this role I was also part of the Management Board.

Key areas of focus (execution):

* Development HR Strategy plan (5-year plan)
* Execute HR Development plan (5-year plan)
* Develop & Execution of Talent Acquisition  (from strategy to operation - incl. hiring new colleagues)
* Re-development of Terms of Employment & Employment Contracts
* Develop Onboarding & Offboarding programs
* Internal trainings (such as: presenting skills (both live and online)LinkedIn and How to make  an impact)
* Development & implementation of "Learning Journeys" (tailor-made programs for all core competencies of TM-Pro)
* HR policies
* Design & implementation of Global Career Framework
* Implementation full-cycle HR-OPS system (BambooHR)
* Operational HR Business Partner

* Part of the COVID-19 Crisis Management Team
* Part of the Digital Branding Team (including website, LinkedIn, MarCom activities)
* Rollout Hybrid Working
* Team of 5 FTE
profile_positions.title: Director of People (HR & Talent Management)

profile_positions.description:
In this role I managed the international TA team, spread over several countries. A number of milestones were; the implementation of a new ATS (Workable), the development and roll-out of several Young Talent Programs & (IT). I renewed the IT Traineeship and put HR Data Intelligence on the map within the organization.

I was also part of the Crisis Management Team during COVID-19.


To stay in front, we need to embrace new ways of working. Complexity, disconnected systems, and old ways of working keep business stuck in yesterday. We work together on developing Agile & scalable solutions that will sharpen the edge. Are you ready to unlock tomorrow? We are ready to give you the key!

Fortunately, I can rely on extensive and broad (International) HR & Recruitment work experience, which means that I can help to shape and continue to build improvements, TA strategies and metrics, as well as working together to learn and grow, as one team. 

I managed an International team, implemented a new ATS (Workable), developed multiple Young Talent Programs & (IT) Developed traineeships, and put HR Data Intelligence on the map. In addition to these short-term, but high-demanding projects, I always make an active contribution to deliver resources and the best new hires for Keylane.

In short, I am an agile, transparent coach and inclusive people manager, who will always support and encourage each team member to develop their professional career by challenging and inspiring everyone to get the most out of themselves. 

For me, it is quite simple. With the right passion and drive, it's all about You, the Team, and the Organisation. After all, we all deserve the very best. And that means that I will do everything I can to achieve this together. 

This promise, I make, every day!
profile_positions.title: Head of Talent Acquisition

profile_positions.description:
In this role I was responsible for the entire process of International Recruitment, Employer Branding & Digital Marketing to connect & select the right talent and professionals for PwC Netherlands, with a focus on Cyber Security, Forensics & Privacy Consulting Services | Technology & PwC's Digital Experience Center.

I build the “STEM" / Digital Talent Network,  by coaching our recruitment team of both Campus Recruiters and Experienced Hires towards a digital future with a clear vision 2020. (Team 12 FTE)

You "may" know us. I want to know you - to shape your Digital Future.
profile_positions.title: Talent Acquisition Manager (incl. Employer Branding "To Engage, Inspire, Learn & Grow")

profile_positions.description:
PwC has acquired Everett, a consultancy specialised in Identity and Access Management solutions. More than 50 consultants in four countries join the professional services firm – with the acquisition PwC Advisory further strengthen its cybersecurity services.


In this role I was am responsible for the entire process of International Recruitment, selection and finding the right talents and professionals for Everett. Strategical, tactical and operational involved by defining the Employer Branding Marketing & Social (online) and Recruitment & HR Strategy for Everett. 

Consultancy is about people. Attracting top-talented people, developing and keeping that talent in our company is what will set us apart from the competition. Our Team is a community with people that work autonomous and take responsibility for their daily work.

We believe in an Identity enabled world. Our Identity Solutions manage the identities and access of people and things and the relationships between them. And provide the right access for the right reasons, enabling the right interactions at the right time.

You can count on us to consult on, design, implement, apply and support your Identity Solutions. Whether you want to increase security and comply with policies and regulations. Or when you want to simplify business processes and reduce the operational and development costs of IT. 

Based on the experiences our people have gained, and the best practices we have built over the 15 years of our existence, we can lead you and your organisation to achieve the desired business results. We help our clients across the world. 

(Team 5 FTE)
profile_positions.title: Senior Manager Talent Acquisition

profile_positions.description:
At Sogeti Netherlands I was responsible for Sourcing & Recruitment of IT Professionals on a daily basis.

From the Cyber ​​Security Business Line:
• Cyber ​​Security Consultants
• Ethical Hackers / Pen Testers
• Identity & Access Management Consultants
• Security Intelligence & Event Monitoring (SIEM)Specialists, with focus on ArcSight and QRadar)

From the Business Line Java:
• Java Developers
• Front End Developers
• Drupal Specialists

Also responsible for various incidental roles such as:
• Sales Executive Roles
• Management & Staff
profile_positions.title: Corporate IT Recruitment, Executive Sourcer & People Hacker

profile_positions.description:
In this role I was strategically, tactically and operationally responsible for the Business Unit Profit. (Banks & Insurers, Utilities, Trade & Industry). (team 5 FTE)

Also active as the employer branding and marketing communications specialist with a focus on event management,  social media and digital employer branding.

Daily Activities & Goals 2012:
* Repositioning the Recruitment team based on SAME project
* Implementation Event Management, based on Knowledge & Sports
* Social Media Campaigns (including via Twitter, LinkedIn, Facebook)
* Development and implementation of new Mobile site
* Day to Day recruitment & Selection (professionals and staff)
profile_positions.title: Team manager Corporate Recruitment & Employer Branding Marketing

profile_positions.description:
ConQuaestor offers organizations solutions for strategic and operational issues. More than 600 entrepreneurial professionals work in the top 200 in both business and government on financial and administrative projects and business processes to improve business operations.

In the role of Manager Talent Acquisition (team 4,5 FTE)  I was also HR Business Partner for all Partners & Senior Managers of ConQuaestor. Daily active with central coordination regarding all recruitment, employer branding and recruitment & selection issues.

This includes:
* Further development Strategic P&S planning
* Employer Branding, Marketing & Communications
* Rollout new Referral Recruitment Program
* Social Media Campaigns (including via Twitter, LinkedIn, Facebook and via QR codes)
* Development and implementation of new corporate careers/job site & mobile careers site
* Recruitment & Selection -hiring of - 100fte (professionals and staff)
* Recruitment & Selection for the Consulting Academy (Traineeship/Campus Recruitment)
* Key User and CMS responsible for the ATS (Otys)
* Project Re-Development of Staff Profiles
profile_positions.title: Manager Talent Acquisition  & Employer Branding
